message: I'm offering you a top-of-the-line product, worth $120 to you. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality item at the regular price of $100. I'm confident you'll be satisfied with this purchase.
I'll take it!

I'm not sure if I should take another chance. The probability of getting a low-quality product is still 66.67%. I'll pass this time.
